definition: all year round/for years on end/average year
variant of 長年累月|长年累月[chang2 nian2 lei3 yue4]

sentences.english: Objective To explore the curative effect and mechanism of hyperbaric oxygenation(HBO) therapy for perennial allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高壓氧治療常年性變應性鼻炎的療效及機理。

sentences.english: It is a mountain filled with snow perennially .
sentences.chinese: 它是一座常年披著面紗的山，山上的雪終年不化。

sentences.english: This year enterprises to provide quality-wine, liquor flavoring.
sentences.chinese: 本企業常年提供優質基酒，調味酒。

sentences.english: The mountain appreared barren, as though it had suffered through many years of arid climate.
sentences.chinese: 這座山看起來光禿禿的，似乎飽受了常年的乾旱天氣。

sentences.english: The ice-free Huangpu River is the main waterway in the Shanghai area.
sentences.chinese: 常年不結冰的黃浦江是上海主要的水路通道。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of Tiaomian-tuomin (TMTM) capsule in treating perennial allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察調免脫敏膠囊治療常年性變應性鼻炎的療效。

sentences.english: The crop that year was only one-third of the usual amount.
sentences.chinese: 那年的收成只是常年產量的三分之一。
浸油潤滑，保證採用常年爐齡。

sentences.english: People use the expression fireworks throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 人們常年使用焰火這個表達。

sentences.english: Apple's customer service, which is perennially ranked highly, is illustrative of the differences.
sentences.chinese: 常年排名很高的蘋果公司顧客服務是這一差異的例證。

sentences.english: However, a tree on the coast, exposed to a constant wind from the sea, bends away from the blast.
sentences.chinese: 然而，海邊的樹常年受海風吹拂，總朝順風方向彎曲。

sentences.english: Turkey has also become a year-round food.
sentences.chinese: 火雞也同樣成爲了常年性食物。

sentences.english: They shall refrain from any action which might reflect on their position as international officials responsible only to the Organization.
sentences.chinese: 祕書長應向大會提送關於本組織工作之常年報告。

sentences.english: The girl kept in training all the year round in the hope of swimming the English Channel in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 那女子常年堅持訓練，希望能在夏季橫渡英吉利海峽。

sentences.english: The nine peak are covered with snow all the year so Mt.
sentences.chinese: 因常年積雪，在萬山羣中格外醒目壯觀。

sentences.english: Annual number of pilgrims and swirling smoke.
sentences.chinese: 常年香客不斷，煙雲繚繞。

definition: variant of 長年累月|长年累月[chang2 nian2 lei3 yue4]
entire year/throughout the year/age at death
to leave early and return late (idiom)
straight (in a straight line)/continuously/always/from the beginning of ... up to .../all along
Dadu, capital of China during the Yuan Dynasty (1280-1368), modern day Beijing
for the most part/on the whole/also pr. [da4 du1]
for the most part/on the whole/metropolitan
